00000000
POS 0 5,11

DLG a
All doors are to be shut and locked before 10:20. They say the curfew has been around since before I was born, but I'm not sure that's true.

DLG b
More and more windows go dark each night. You can never be sure if it's someone being re-located or a law enforcement encounter.

DLG c
My bed. One of the few things I have acquired using my credits.

DLG d
My bed. One of the few things I have acquired using my credits.

DLG e
Just a few old vegetables and some liquor.

DLG f
An old gas stove. It was probably installed sometime in the 40's.

DLG g
Boris hasn't been getting much water lately. They're looking a bit frail.

DLG h
Though the tap water is metallic, it's better than getting stale milk at the commissary.

DLG i
A record player playing foreign music. Just owning this player could get me thrown in prison.

DLG j
Foreign records. Some people have no idea how illegal these are.

DLG k
A pair of headphones. If the neighbors heard me playing this stuff out loud they'd report me in a heartbeat.
